overview: Detective Chick Carter (Lyle Talbot)finds himself on his most exciting case when Sherry Martin (Julie Gibson), a singer at the Century Club, reports the robbery of the famous Blue Diamond, owned by Joe Carney (Charles King), the owner of the nightclub.
tagline: THE MASTER SLEUTH OF SHADOW MAGAZINE, SHADOW COMICS AND RADIO IN A SERIAL THRILLER-DILLER!
title: Chick Carter, Detective
